firstChallenge.name: selfie
firstChallenge.description: Start things off right with a selfie! Explore the self-timer setting on your camera.

firstChallenge.name: sunset
firstChallenge.description: This week's photography challenge is to get out and photograph at the end of the light - sunrise or sunset. Best times of day for landscape photography!

firstChallenge.name: Rule of Thirds
firstChallenge.description: Lets open up space in the frame to look into the background and see what else is going on in the frame

firstChallenge.name: Something blue
firstChallenge.description: What color is the sky? How about the ocean? Discover the world of this lovely color
